title: Jeb：将加入郁金香
author: seraph0012
txt_content:
本帖最后由 seraph0012 于 2013-8-17 18:08 编辑 

消息来自reddit

Jeb：我认为这种花在游戏中名字应该就叫芍药，因为我不打算添加其他种类的芍药。然而，游戏中将会有几种不同的郁金香。（
I think the ingame name will simply be "Paeonia", because I don't plan to add any other paeonias. However, there are several kinds of tulips.）

Sirhibbsy：碉堡了！新版本将会有新品种的蘑菇吗？（How lovely! Are there perhaps different types of mushrooms now?）

Jeb：这主意不错。蘑菇现在占有2个物品id。太浪费了（Not a bad idea. The mushrooms currently occupy two block IDs, which is a huge waste...）

Exeldoh：能在山脉生物群系中加入雪绒花吗？（And rare Edelweisses in mountain biomes ?）

Jeb：这好像很难在8像素之内画出来。（Seems like a difficult flower to draw in 8 pixels...）

CSIEddie：这些花都是纯装饰用的吗？（Are the flowers purely decorative?）

Jeb：是的。我们倾向于把旧的物品重做并给与他们新功能，但是目前我们只打算把花用于装饰你的花园。以及用来区别不同的生物群系。(Yes Edit: We have a tendency to revisit old items and give them new uses, but for now the flowers are only to make your gardens look pretty. And to give flair to biomes, of course.)

dream6601：我希望你能让游戏中的芍药更接近现实中的芍药 —— 一小丛灌木中长着许多花，而不是一格孤零零的花。我知道这可以通过材质包来实现，但是我希望在原版中的花能更真实。（I wish you'd make them look more like real Paeonias, a small bush with lots of flowers, not a single stock with single flower. I know I can resource pack it, but it would be nice to have it accurate in the true game.）

Jeb：我也是这么想的。直到我发现我们现在的玫瑰是什么样子的。（I was actually thinking the same, but then I realized what the rose looks like.）
